Index.title: Hello world!
Index.section1: is a unique business district. It is a gold business center, jewelry, diamonds, weapons, Thai fabric center, the country's largest foreign imported lace center, a food center, famous Thai desserts and a comfortable residence in the city center, adjacent to Sam Yot Station, It is the first mixed-use project on Rattanakosin Island, and is the largest plaza in this location.

Contact.title: CONTACT US
Contact.subtitle: Have any question? We'd love to hear from you.
Contact.name: THE OLD SIAM PLAZA

Footer.title: GET IN TOUCH
Footer.detail: The Old Siam Plaza is a classic shopping mall on Rattanakosin Island.
